headline: Hard Times
abstract: “Tightrope,” by the Pulitzer Prize-winning authors Nicholas Kristof and Sheryl WuDunn, is a wrenching portrait of rural Yamhill, Ore., Kristof’s hometown and a microcosm for America.
lead_paragraph: TIGHTROPE Americans Reaching for HopeBy Nicholas D. Kristof and Sheryl WuDunn
